title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: Generative AI-Based Creativity Education Program for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can pose at least three mathematical problems based on data tables/images/scenarios in terms of fluency, flexibility, and originality.
Learners can revise existing problems at least twice and generate new problems reflecting contextual creativity through conversational interactions with ChatGPT.
Learners can analyze and report on strategic thinking and educational applicability in the AI-assisted problem-posing process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
